api_list.name: v1-Get-Accounts
api_list.description: Returns Account record matched by ID

api_list.name: v1-GetAll-Jobs
api_list.description: Returns list of Jobs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shopalive.p.rapidapi.com/v1/Jobs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shopalive.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
